testimonials.title: What Clients Say
testimonials.testimonial1: Working with ZhenGrowth completely transformed how I approach my career. I finally have the clarity and confidence I've been searching for.
testimonials.testimonial2: The coaching helped me land my dream role and negotiate a 40% salary increase. More importantly, I know exactly where I'm headed.
testimonials.testimonial3: I went from feeling stuck to having a clear 5-year plan and the tools to execute it. Best investment in myself I've ever made.
